Reviews.Title: A Great Texter Smartphone!
Reviews.Author: Paul "wds"
Reviews.Content: It does everything including internet, texting. I am very happy about this product.  This being a quad bands unlocked phone, I am able to use this phone with any carriers' Sim card with no problem. That is Motorola!

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Daniel Gómez
Reviews.Content: The phone works ok, however sometimes it takes a really long time to make a call after pressing the button (about 1 minute, even more) which is very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Overheated and bricked after 50 days.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Phone overheated under normal use. Phone is stuck in boot-up loop. Hard reset had no affect. After looking on web, seems that this is not uncommon for this phone.
